page.title: 07EVENT
page.content: {The final 1984-85 Rainworth Welfare}2{ {Meadows Albion}0 50 seconds gone & Rainworth scored. A corner from the left by Comerford was powerfully headed in by defender Mark Fell.Constant pressure by Albion never paid off.Reserve goalie Sprigg made several good saves.Jephson's cross was met by Branston's head but Sprigg deflected it for a corner. Another cross by Jephson was not cleared by Rainworth and Sprigg dived full length in a crowded goal mouth. At half time it was 1-0.In the second half Rainworth were looking for another goal.Meadows kept the pressure on but could not score.Sprigg kept Rainworth in the game with more fine saves.Rainworth attacked with Comerford & Guy.A pass by Comerford to Guy, who shot, was deflected by Ely & into the net.Final score 2-0.
